altername_name: Kids Training: Juego y Aprendo con las Palabras
name: Learning to Spell
overview: An educational touch-screen game which aims to teach children how to spell. Over 300 words for your child to master Mini-games which develop skills in spelling, handwriting and reading Sticker-book reward feature designed to encourage your child to keep on learning Puppy companion that encourages and guides your child through the games
